### Hi there, I'm Wellington! üëã

I'm a Backend Developer from Brazil, focused on the Java and Spring ecosystem. I'm passionate about building robust, scalable, and high-quality software solutions. I'm always learning and applying best practices like TDD, SOLID, and Clean Architecture in my projects.

### üöÄ Featured Projects

- **[API for Service Order Management System (Capstone Project)](https://github.com/S-I-G-O-S/Backend/tree/main/backend)**
  - REST API for managing service orders, with a focus on security and development best practices.
  - *Technologies: Java 17, Spring Boot, Spring Security (JWT), JPA, Flyway, PostgreSQL.*

- **[Movie Catalog API (Alura Java Immersion)](https://github.com/WMarques25/Imersao-Java-Alura)**
  - RESTful API for exposing a movie catalog, deployed in a cloud environment.
  - *Technologies: Java, Spring Boot, MongoDB, Docker.*

- **[iFood-inspired App (Alura Mobile Immersion)](https://github.com/WMarques25/Imersao-Mobile)**
  - UI development study for a cross-platform mobile application.
  - *Technologies: Flutter, Dart.*
